title: Uncooked stew

properties.name: description
properties.value: Uncooked stew is made using the Cooking skill. It is made by adding a raw potato and either cooked meat or cooked chicken into a bowl of water. The product is the same regardless of which of the two types of meat is used. The ingredients can be added in any order.

Uncooked stew
Released11 June 2001 (Update)
MembersNo

Advanced data
Item ID2001

Uncooked stew is made using the Cooking skill. It is made by adding a raw potato and either cooked meat or cooked chicken into a bowl of water. The product is the same regardless of which of the two types of meat is used. The ingredients can be added in any order.

Adding a first ingredient creates an incomplete stew and adding the second ingredient creates the uncooked stew. It can then be cooked at level 25 Cooking to make stew, granting 117 experience. Alternatively, adding three curry leaves or one spice before cooking the stew produces an uncooked curry, which can be cooked at level 60 Cooking to make curry, granting 280 experience.
